content: every dedicated fly fisher across the globe dreams about fishing the legendary mikkeli pool in altaelva a dream that in most cases never comes true his majesty of norway king harald has fished in mikkeli annually since the early 90s i myself have been fortunate enough to have had several fishing trips to mikkeli the mikkeli sweater is an outdoor sweater that is excellent for fly fishing but also for other outdoor activities it is worked bottom up has an a-line shaped body and a round yoke if you want a straight body download this mikkeli sweater easter 1 **size guide** the measurements in this pattern is only correct if the given gauge is achieved the sweater should have a positive ease from 5 to 10 cm the sizes xxs xs s m l xl 2xl are intended to fit a bust measurement of approx 80-85 85-90 90-95 95-100 100-110 110-120 120-130 cm measure yourself or the one your knitting for to find the perfect size if you re 90 cm around your bust you should knit a size s that
